bin/2mb.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   2-Max Bound solver.
00003  *
00004  * Solves the 2-max bound (2MB) on the given input file.
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 
00012 /* Global variables */
00013 char *program_name;             /**< Program name */
00014 char *input_file = NULL;        /**< Given input TSPLIB file */
00015 char *xml_file = NULL;
00016 
00017 /* Program options */
00018 #define NUM_OPTS 2
00019 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00020 {
00021     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00022         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00023     {'x', "xml", "File to write XML output to",
00024         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE}
00025 };
00026 char *desc = "2-Max Bound solver";
00027 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options] ";
00028 
00029 /* Main method */
00030 int 
00031 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00032 {   
00033     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00034     
00035     arrow_problem problem;
00036     arrow_bound_result result;
00037     
00038     /* Read program arguments */
00039     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00040         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00041 
00042     /* Try and read the problem file and its info */
00043     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00044         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00045     
00046     /* Solve BAP */
00047     if(!arrow_2mb_solve(&problem, &result))
00048     {
00049         arrow_print_error("Could not solve 2-Max Bound on file.");
00050         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00051     }
00052     
00053     printf("\n2-Max Bound Solution: %d\n", result.obj_value);
00054     printf("Total Time: %5.2f\n", result.total_time);
00055     
00056     /* Print out XML file if required */
00057     if(xml_file != NULL)
00058     {
00059         FILE *xml;
00060         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00061         {
00062             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00063             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00064             goto CLEANUP;
00065         }
00066         
00067         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_bound type=\"2MB\" ");
00068         fprintf(xml, "problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00069         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00070         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00071         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00072         fprintf(xml, "    <objective_value>%d</objective_value>\n", 
00073                 result.obj_value);
00074         fprintf(xml, "    <total_time>%5.2f</total_time>\n", 
00075                 result.total_time);
00076         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_bound>\n");
00077         
00078         fclose(xml);
00079     }
00080         
00081 CLEANUP:
00082     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00083     return ret;
00084 }
